channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins ElasticBox Jenkins Kubernetes CI/CD Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins ElasticBox Jenkins Kubernetes CI/CD Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2211|2024-08-04T07:01:41.119Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elasticbox%20jenkins%20kubernetes%20ci%2Fcd%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins ElasticBox Jenkins Kubernetes CI/CD Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not configure its YAML parser to prevent the instantiation of arbitrary types, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-10470|2024-08-04T22:24:18.555Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elasticbox%20jenkins%20kubernetes%20ci%2Fcd%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins ElasticBox Jenkins Kubernetes CI/CD Plugin in form-related methods allowed users with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials ID of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-10468|2024-08-04T22:24:18.585Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elasticbox%20jenkins%20kubernetes%20ci%2Fcd%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins ElasticBox Jenkins Kubernetes CI/CD Plugin allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-10469|2024-08-04T22:24:18.610Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elasticbox%20jenkins%20kubernetes%20ci%2Fcd%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins ElasticBox Jenkins Kubernetes CI/CD Plugin allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
